def find_a_couch():
    # Determine if there is a couch in the known information
    symbol couch_exists=exists c: item : is_couch(c)
    return couch_exists

def sittable_couch(couch:item):
    # Check if the couch is sittable
    symbol couch_sittable=sittable(couch)
    return couch_sittable

behavior sit_on_couch_now(couch:item):
    # Use a learned behavior to sit on the couch
    body:
        sit_on_couch(couch)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if find_a_couch():
            # Check if there is a couch based on the available information
            bind couch: item where:
                is_couch(couch) and sittable_couch(couch) 
            # Select a couch that is sittable
            sit_on_couch_now(couch)
            # Sit on the selected couch
        else:
           # If no couch is found in the known information, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach couch: item:
                if is_couch(couch) and not visited(couch):
                    observe(couch,"Is it sittable")
                    # Observe to check if the couch is sittable

def is_remote_nearby(remote_control:item):
    # Check if the remote control is close
    symbol is_close=exists o: item : is_remote_control(o) and close(o, couch_352)
    return is_close

behavior locate_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control) 
        # Move the character closer to the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if is_remote_nearby(remote_control_2052):
            # If the remote control is found nearby the couch
            bind remote_control: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote_control) and close(remote_control, couch_352)
            locate_remote_control(remote_control)
        else:
            # If remote control is not nearby, start searching until its found
            foreach o: item:
                if is_remote_control(o) and not visited(o):
                    observe(o, "Locate the remote control")
